SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.distributed

Class ServerImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.distributed.ServerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Server, Serializable, Remote
public class ServerImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Server
The ServerImpl class is an implementation of Server interface. It implements method to handle game lobbies and player registration and updates.
See Also:

    • register

      public void register(Client client, String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Registers a client with his nickname, adds the client to the controller's client List and as model listener, if successful the player's ID is created (int on multiples of 10) and invokes an update on the player's client with the just created ID
      Specified by:
      register in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - client to register
      nickname - player's nickname
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the execution of update method call goes wrong

    • update

      Update method with all the player's choices (coordinates, column) to update the controller and the matchLog
      Specified by:
      update in interface Server
      Parameters:
      client - the choosing player
      coords - coordinates chosen
      column - the shelf column chosen

      RemoteException - if the execution of the update method call goes wrong
